wikipedia_page.main: Stanley Charles Machent (23 March 1921 – 17 December 2012) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward in the Football League for Sheffield United and Chesterfield and in non-League football for Buxton and Hereford United.

response: His younger brother, Stan Machent, played as an inside forward for Sheffield United and Chesterfield in the 1940s. He died on 31 December 1996 in Chesterfield at the age of 86.
